On Mon, Aug 11, 2025 at 4:50 PM Eric Bernabe <Eric.Bernabe@3d-consultants.com <mailto:Eric.Bernabe@3d-consultants.com> > wrote:


	Dear Saadine,

	 

	Thank you for connecting with 3d.

	Main contractor Insurance coverage is usually issued for Fit-out purposes (1 year coverage) which I believe already expired since EV lab is handed over since May 2025. 

	 

	Please check with your admin team who are renewing your trade license.

	 

	Regards,

	Eric

Main contractor Insurance coverage is usually issued for Fit-out purposes (1 year coverage) which I believe already expired since EV lab is handed over since May 2025.

	Eric

	Dear Eric,

	Hope all is well,

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Eric,

	Hope all is well,

	I understand Gilbert is on annual leave. I’ve recently taken over as General Manager at EVLAB and, while going through our files, I noticed we don’t have any record of our insurance coverage on the shared drive for EVLAB.

	The previous GM had mentioned that coverage is in place, but I haven’t been able to locate the documentation. Could you please share a copy with me, or let me know who might have it?

	Appreciate your support.

	Best regards,

Saadeddine El Nakib

  General Manager

 

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/6dVfClMq4TqXKmnFGfvszvId5?domain=eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com>
